definition: Yalong river of Tibet and Sichuan

sentences.english: Ertan hydropower station is the first power station built on Yalong River.
sentences.chinese: 二灘水電站是雅礱江梯級開發的第一個水電站。

sentences.english: As the largest tributary of Jinsha river, Yalong river is abundant in hydropower resources.
sentences.chinese: 雅礱江是金沙江的最大支流，水力資源十分豐富。

sentences.english: Jinping First Stage Hydropower Station is an important cascade hydropower station located on Yalong River in Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 錦屏一級水電站是雅礱江干流上的重要梯級電站。
